sentences.sContent: But apparently this is only an illusion.
sentences.sContent_eng: But apparently this is only an illusion.
sentences.sCn: 但显然这只是一个错觉。

sentences.sContent: The news had apparently been aimed at stealing the thunder from his visit.
sentences.sContent_eng: The news had apparently been aimed at stealing the thunder from his visit.
sentences.sCn: 这篇新闻显然是在对他的访问作先声夺人的报道。

sentences.sContent: But if you were so inclined, apparently all you have to do work on the railroad.
sentences.sContent_eng: But if you were so inclined, apparently all you have to do work on the railroad.
sentences.sCn: 不过，如果你有这种想法的话，显然你所需要做的就是——去铁路局工作。
